item.title: Stop/Delete All Docker Containers/Images
item.description: Sometimes it’s useful to start with a clean slate and remove all Docker containers and even images. Here are some handy shortcuts. List all containers (only IDs) docker ps -aq Stop all running containers docker stop $(docker ps -aq) Remove all containers docker rm $(docker ps -aq) Remove all images docker rmi $(docker images -q) Copied from: https://blog.baudson.de/blog/stop-and-remove-all-docker-containers-and-images
